Zucchini Parmesan Crisps

50 min | Makes 4 servings, half-cup each
This can be made without the cheese to make it vegan and/or appealing to Parmesan-haters, but is way less tasty. Add more salt to taste if you...

bake   parmesan   side-dish   southern   summer   vegetarian   weeknight   zucchini
Made with love and many mistakes by Sharon Brener.
